page.title: 06Leisure And Recreation
page.content: There are many things for people who live in the Sorbie area, to do in their spare time. Some of the older people enjoy going for walks in Kilsture forest, following the trail. This is also an attraction for{ {tourism}. In the summer, the outdoor{bowling {green}is open for anyone to join. It costs Â£10 for seniors and Â£5 for juniors.It has about 60 members this year. When the bowling green is closed in the autumn, indoor bowling is held in the village hall on Monday and Wednesday evenings. For children there is a{swing park} which is used a lot, but television takes its place when it rains. Some people go to either Wigtown or Whithorn to play bingo. The{village {hall}provides accomodation for indoor football, badminton, clubs and discos.
